text: eyaṭa firavungē janatāvagen vū pradhānīn (firavunṭa) “mūsāda ohugē janatāvada bhūmiyehi aparādha kara obavada, oba (visin æti karana lada) devivarunvada pratikṣēpa kara damana men oba ovunva athæra damannehida?”yi vimasūha. eyaṭa ohu “(noesēya!) ovungē pirimi daruvanva kapā damā, (ovunva avaman kara damanu piṇisa) ovungē gæhænu daruvanva (pamaṇak) paṇa piṭin jīvat vannaṭa iḍa harinnemu. niyata vaśayenma api ovun kerehi ādhipatyaya tabā ættemu. (ebævin api kæmati andamaṭama ōna dæyak kaḷa hækiya)” yayi ohu kīvēya
